text.content:
Poisoned

  • The creature is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.9X088PM7H5U2S1HQ]{Sickened} and has @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} level 1.
  • Poisoned creatures cannot decrease their @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} level by taking a long rest.

Poisoned creatures gain 1 level of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} every day until cured.
